helpText: ł_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ą.

generic.title: ł_Error updating categories__________________________ą
generic.message: ł_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ą.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ł_Error updating categories__________________________ą
maxDepthExceeded.message: ł_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ą.

destinationHasSameName.title: ł_Error updating categories__________________________ą
destinationHasSameName.message: ł_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ą.

noSchema.title: ł_Schema not found_________________ą
noSchema.message: ł_Item schema not found for user_________________ą.

maxCharacter.title: ł_Error updating categories__________________________ą
maxCharacter.message: ł_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ą.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ł_Delete category________________ą
deleteInUseCategory.message: ł_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ą.

custom.title: ł_Custom categories__________________ą
custom.message: ł_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ą.

arcgis.title: ł_ArcGIS categories__________________ą
arcgis.message: ł_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ą.

iso.title: ł_ISO categories_______________ą
iso.message: ł_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ą.

inspire.title: ł_INSPIRE categories___________________ą
inspire.message: ł_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ą.
